captions.text: Hi there.
I'm Mira, your smile tutor.
Looks like you had a bit of trouble earlier.
But no worries.
It happens to many at first.
Let's work on this together.
Now, let's bring balance to your smile.
Grab a coffee stirrer and place it gently between your teeth.
Lift the corners of your mouth evenly on both sides.
Focus on keeping both sides symmetrical.
This trains your facial muscles to move in sync.
Hold for 10 seconds.
Good.
Nice work.
Next, let's build width and control.
Place the coffee stirrer horizontally just above your upper lip.
Lift both corners of your mouth upward toward the stirrer.
Hold that position for 10 seconds and breathe naturally.
Feel that gentle stretch across your cheeks.
Relax.
You're doing great.
You're almost there.
Final push.
Let's make this one count.
Set the stirrer aside.
We'll focus on making your smile smooth and natural.
Place your palm against your cheek.
Wrap your fingers around it, resting your thumb in the small hollow just below your jawbone.
Say he and hold it until your breath runs out.
Then gently close your mouth and take a slow, deep breath in.
In through your nose.
Well done.
Excellent work today.
Thank you for all the smiles.
Ready to try again for the verification?
